prompts: Create an ice-type Pokemon with a crystalline body and cold aura.
Imagine a Pokemon resembling a giant ice sculpture with glowing features.
Design a legendary Pokemon that embodies the essence of winter and frost.
Generate a Pokemon with sharp, icy edges and an ethereal presence.
Show me a mythical creature made entirely of ice, with a powerful stance.
Make an ice-type Pokemon that looks like a majestic glacier with a regal pose.
Give me a Pokemon that channels the power of snowstorms and glacial winds.

distinctive_features: Outstretched arm resembling an ice crystal
